title: Unable to load svg image with stream or actual path
body:
### Description

I like to use Svg file because it is easy to edit and use it as a png file. It is also possible to add extra elements into svg file on the fly. I like to convert svg file on the fly not at the compile time.

### Code

I loaded the default file provided (dotnet_bot.svg) and loaded into stream with no problem. The  svg.Load function need actual file or stream to load. It fails with both inputs. 
[SvgToPng.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/12778167/SvgToPng.zip)


### Expected Behavior

I should be able to print png file. 

### Actual Behavior

It cashes asking Offet which is bogus message. 

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.2 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

All

### Platform / Operating System Version

_No response_

### Devices

_No response_
